official_title: To extend until December 31, 1998, the temporary suspension of duties on 2,6-Dichlorobenzonitrile, relating to mixtures and inerts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1998, the suspension of duty on 2-6-dichlorobenzonitrile relating to mixtures and inerts.

titles.title: To extend until December 31, 1998, the temporary suspension of duties on 2,6-Dichlorobenzonitrile, relating to mixtures and inerts.
